income_messages:
From: t************3@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-20 16:24:49
SUBJECT: DEAR SIR.
DEAR SIR.
MY NAME IS Tony Maxwell A BUSINESS DEVELOPEMENT CONSULTANT FOR WORLD BANK PROJECTS IN AFRICA.
WE HAVE A FOUR YEAR CONTRACT TO CONSULT,MAKE RECOMMENDATIONS, OPEN CONTRACT BID AND MAKE APPROVALS FOR PAYMENT OF CONTRACTS OR SUPPLIES MADE IN AFRICAN COUNTRIES UNDER THAT CATEGORY.OUR CONTRACTUAL AGREEMENT WILL EXPIRE THIS YEAR 2023,AND WE ARE REQUIRED TO RETIRE AND ROUND UP DOCUMENTATION OF JOBS EXECUTED AND PAYMENTS MADE OR PENDING.
MY PROPOSAL THAT WE WANT TO FILL IN THE GAPS OF CONTRACTS OR SUPPLIES,SO WE CAN RETIRE THE BALANCE. IN THIS CASE YOU ARE REQUIRED TO SEND ME A PROFORMA INVOICE OF YOUR PRODUCTS IF YOU HAVE, SO WE SELECT AND HAVE YOU APPLY  FOR SUPPLIES SO WE CAN RETIRE THE REMAINING FUNDS WHICH RUNS INTO MILLIONS OF DOLLARS.
THE SUPPLY ,RECEIPT AND PAYMENT PATTERNS HAS BEEN WELL ARTICULATED.SO THERE IS REALLY NOTHING TO WORRY ABOUT.
PLS DISREGARD THIS MAIL IF YOU ARE NOT INTERESTED.
MORE  DETAILS WILL BE GIVEN ON YOUR INDICATION OF INTEREST.
THANKING YOU AND EXPECTING A MORE BUSINESS RELATIONSHIP WITH YOU.
Tony Maxwell 
From: t************3@gmail.com
To: bq40398@l******s.email
Time: 2023-05-01 11:25:28
SUBJECT: Re: DEAR SIR.
Sir,
Thank you for your interest. The explanation is that we will crop the
payment file of a contractor who had earlier been paid, put an application
on your behalf for a supplementary payment on the same job description,
follow the process filing and establish a payment reference code, then
secure an approval for the payment to be transferred to your nominated
account. Documents will be prepared to that effect.
To this end, you will be required to send me the following information.
1; Name
2. Address  and Phone Number
3.Occupation
4.Country of origin.
5.Bank name and address. {account details will be requested when we get
approval}
And maybe any other information that will be required as we make progress.
when we are sure of the amount of approval then we will discuss modalities
of share
NOTE; The confidentiality of this project is highly paramount.
Regards
Tony Maxwell
outbound_messages:
From: bq40398@l******s.email
To: t************3@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-20 16:24:54
SUBJECT: Re: DEAR SIR.
Dear Tony Maxwell,
Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the opportunity to learn more about your proposal. Can you please provide me with more information about the types of products you are interested in and the specific countries in Africa where the contracts were executed? Additionally, can you explain the process for selecting suppliers and making payments? 
Thank you for your time and I look forward to hearing back from you.
Best regards.
Best wishes,
Rebecca
From: bq40398@l******s.email
To: t************3@gmail.com
Time: 2023-05-01 13:13:03
SUBJECT: Re: DEAR SIR.
Dear Tony Maxwell,
Thank you for your response. I appreciate the information you have provided. However, before I proceed, I would like to clarify a few things. Can you please explain to me in more detail how this payment file cropping process works? Also, what is the approval process for the payment to be made to my nominated account? 
Furthermore, I would like to know more about the project you mentioned. Can you please provide me with more information about it? 
Regarding the personal information you have requested, I am hesitant to provide my account details at this stage. Can we discuss this further once I have a better understanding of the process and the project? 
Thank you for your time and assistance.
Best wishes,
Rebecca
